summary: Through Loki's treachery, two children in the Viking age find themselves spirited away into the world of Norse Mythology.
cast: Dick Kaysø|Preben Kristensen|Laura Bro|Marie Ingerslev|Nis Bank-Mikkelsen|Benny Hansen|Olaf Nielsen|Thomas Eje|Claus Ryskjær|Kirsten Rolffes|Jesper Klein|Susse Wold|Percy Edwards|Radost Bokel|Hans Clarin|Allan Corduner|Michael Elphick|Manfred Erdmann|Alice Franz|Dagmar Heller|John Hollis|Monika John|Alexander Jones|Mark Lewis Jones|Suzanne Jones|Ernst-Hugo Järegård|Christian Marschall|Geoffrey Matthews|Walter Reichelt|Norbert Steinke|Stephen Thorne|Christian Tramitz
director: Directors: Peter Madsen, Jeffrey James Varab (co-director)
title: Valhalla
